headings.usage: All page titles, section headers, and major stats. Use uppercase for H1/H2.

body.usage: All paragraph text, data tables, inputs, and chat messages.

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid #030303.
Use 'primary' (Neon Green) for 'System Online', 'Success', and main CTAs.
Use 'secondary' (Cyan) for AI Chat and Information.

scanlines.css: background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,255,255,0), rgba(255,255,255,0) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2)); background-size: 100% 4px; pointer-events: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: 50; opacity: 0.15;

buttons.classes: rounded-none border border-primary/50 bg-primary/10 text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-black uppercase tracking-widest font-bold transition-all duration-200 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,255,148,0.2)] hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,255,148,0.6)]

cards.classes: bg-black/40 border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm p-6 relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-primary/30 transition-all

inputs.classes: bg-black border border-white/20 rounded-none focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary text-primary font-mono placeholder:text-gray-700

status_indicator.online: w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-primary shadow-[0_0_8px_#00FF94] animate-pulse

layout.spacing: Compact but breathable. Use p-4 for panels, gap-4 for grids.

animations.glitch: Use a CSS keyframe animation for 'glitch' effect on hover for titles.
animations.scan: A vertical line moving down for 'scanning' tools.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure neon text is readable against black. Use 'font-medium' or 'font-bold' for colored text.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable scanlines and glitch effects if 'prefers-reduced-motion' is true.

media.image_style: Desaturated, high contrast, or tinted with green/cyan overlay.

hero_background.description: Dark server room with blue/green lights. Use as background for Login or Hero with heavy overlay.

cyber_texture.description: Abstract code/matrix texture. Use for 'About' or 'Mission' headers.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' immediately.
2. GLOBAL CSS: Add the 'scanlines' class to 'index.css' and apply it to the <body> tag.
3. TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors (primary: #00FF94, etc) and font families.
4. SHADCN: When using Shadcn components, STRIP the 'rounded-md' classes. We want SHARP edges (rounded-none) for that Cyberpunk look.
5. LAYOUT: The Dashboard should feel like a HUD. Use borders to separate sections, not just whitespace.
6. CHAT: The AI Chat should look like a terminal window. Green text on black background.
7. MISSIONS: Use the 'status_indicator' styles for the 200/404 checks.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, mission items).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
